title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 226.4 - Location of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 226.4 - Location of records

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and
copying at Agency Building #1, Empire State Plaza, Albany, N.Y. 12238, or at
such other location as may be designated by the records access officer, where
feasible, for the convenience of the requester. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
226.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
